column5: My buddy went, and I believe the walleye fishing was decent, they were even catching them up shallow. water temps were up to about 56-58 so I would imagine the shallow walleye bite will be in full swing by the end of this week.
Thanks, we will be there 6/3-10. I can report when we return.

A friend of mine was fishing over on the Western Peninsula of LOTW last week. They caught and released up to 13 lakers biggest in the 14lb bracket. Some nice walleye in Ptarmigan Bay, and on the average of 40 bass per day. Most of the fishing was done in the Cul-de-Sac area of the lake. In other words they had a blast.http://www.hooknbullet.ca
JGB Thank You as well. I was looking at the weather last night and it shows a high of 89deg on Sunday(wow!!). We are leaving on Friday June 2 and cannot wait. I will report when we return. thx again.
